title: Jennifer Lopez is beautiful in baby blue as the Hustlers star heads out in NYC
text:
She's recently been spotted undertaking night shoots on her next film project, titled Marry Me.

But Jennifer Lopez took an evening off on Saturday, with the 50-year-old actress seen heading out with her family for dinner at Cipriani in New York.

The Hustlers star looked chic in a baby blue coat over a matching sweater for the outing with her 11-year-old daughter Emme and her sister Lynda.

Family time: Jennifer Lopez took an evening off work on Saturday, with the 50-year-old actress seen heading out with her family for dinner at Cipriani in New York. Seen here with daughter Emme and sister Lynda

JLo also matched her footwear, donning a pair of light blue Timberland boots for the evening out.

She completed the look with slouchy blue jeans and shades.

Jennifer's brunette tresses were piled above her head in a loose bun and her minimal makeup featured a dab of nude lip liner.

Her daughter, one half of the pop star's twins Emme and Max, went casual in a cream-colored Champion hoodie, tan sweat pants and Converse All Star sneakers.

Oh baby! The Hustlers star looked chic in a baby blue coat over a matching sweater for the outing

Well-heeled: JLo also matched her footwear, donning a pair of light blue Timberland boots for the evening out

Lopez recently scored some of the best reviews of her career and instantly generated Oscar buzz with the release of her film Hustlers.

And the Jenny from the Block hitmaker is already at work on her follow-up film Marry Me, a romantic comedy featuring Owen Wilson, 50.

The actress and singer was spotted Friday night on set in New York City while filming a scene in a striking pair of leather shorts.

Good hair night: Jennifer's brunette tresses were piled above her head in a loose bun and her minimal makeup featured a dab of nude lip liner

Jennifer and Owen's new film is based on the graphic novel of the same name by Bobby Crosby about a pop singer whose world is thrown upside down after she learns that her rocker boyfriend has been cheating on her only moments before they're set to tie the knot at Madison Square Garden.

After an emotion-fueled meltdown on stage, Jennifer's character picks a random person out of the audience to marry instead, with the lucky man being Owen's math teacher character, who happens to be holding a sign reading 'Marry Me.'

The film is a return of sorts for the If You Had My Love singer, who lit up movie screens early in her career with romantic comedy hits like Maid In Manhattan and The Wedding Planner.
description: Jennifer Lopez took an evening off work on Saturday, with the 50-year-old actress seen heading out with her family for dinner at Cipriani in New York.
